page.title: 04Traffic Count M11
page.content:
We did a traffic count on the{M11}in our D Block. We counted the traffic at 7.30am, 12.30pm and 5.30pm. The heaviest{southbound}traffic was at 7.30am. The heaviest{northbound} traffic was at 5.30pm.
We counted for ten minutes and multiplied the counts by 6 to give us{ {vehicles per hour.}
7.30am 12.30pm 5.30pm {N} S {N} S {N} S
Cars {816}1770{ 978} 666{2628}1098 Lorries {294} 300{ 288} 222{ 186} 132 Tankers { 18} 6{ 12} 6{ 12} 6 Vans { 72} 138{ 60} 48{ 186} 78 Buses {0} 6{ 0} 0{ 0} 0 Coaches {6} 24{ 6} 12{ 12} 12 M/Bikes {0} 12 { 0} 6{ 18} 12 Total { 1206}2256{1344} 960{3042}1338
